divs: sighting detailslocation: tyler, tx, corner of bow and spring, lasseters grocery parking lot. time of day: 6 pm or so, near sunset. date, late spring\early summer. mom parked the car and ran into the grocery store to pick something up for dinner. i rolled down the car window and sat on the door facing west. my brother and sister were fighting in the back seat. i was sitting on the door to catch a breeze, but there wasn't any. i caught a movement to the north out of the corner of my eye. it was a disc shaped object moving in s southerly direction. it crossed bow st, over the church at the corner across from the parking lot and hovered over the concrete water tower. it was getting darker and it seemed to glow a red-orange, not like a sunset, like it was hot. it hovered there for about 5-6 minutes. then took off like a bullet to the south, passing over the peoples bank building. altitude: i think about 500 feet. it was totally silent. no wind, or sound. size about the diameter of the water tower.
Summary: Came in out of the north, hovered over water tower
